short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A new way to view grades on Infinite Campus

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Scorecery is a chrome extension to help students of the SRVUSD district have an easier way of viewing grades. It takes inspiration from other grade viewer, and condenses everything into an easy to use application with a nice user interface.

Scorecery makes viewing grades easy, and prevents the hassle from browsing through Infinite Campus. You can predict future grades based on new assignments, and see how your grade would be affected.
